mapper.select: select m.m_name, q.qno, q.q_kind, q.q_title, q.q_content, q.q_date, q.q_answer, c.q_name from tbl_qna q, tbl_member m, code_answer c where m.m_id = q.m_id and m.m_id = #{m_id} and c.q_code = 'q1001' order by qno desc
select * from tbl_qna order by qno desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_qna (qno, m_id, q_kind, q_title, q_content, q_answer) values (#{qno}, #{m_id}, #{q_kind}, #{q_title}, #{q_content}, #{q_answer})
mapper.update: update tbl_qna set m_id = #{m_id}, q_kind = #{q_kind}, q_title = #{q_title}, q_content = #{q_content}, q_answer = #{q_answer} where qno = #{qno}
